title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 975.10 - Application for Federal aid
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 975.10 - Application for Federal aid

State Regulations
(a) Where a
transportation system is eligible to apply for Federal operating assistance and

Federal funds have been identified and reserved for this purpose, the
transportation system must apply for such Federal aid or jeopardize its claim
to any State operating assistance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
975.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
